name: Hyundai Grand i10 Nios
description: The price of Hyundai Grand i10 Nios, a 5 seater Hatchback, ranges from Rs. 5.92  - 8.56 Lakh. It is available in 14 variants, with an engine of 1197 cc and a choice of 2 transmissions: Manual and Automatic. Grand i10 Nios has an NCAP rating of 2 stars and comes with 6 airbags. Hyundai Grand i10 Nios is available in 9 colours. Users have reported a mileage of 19.5 kmpl for Grand i10 Nios.
